meanings.definition: Small celestial bodies that formed during the early stages of the solar system's evolution.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study planetesimals to learn about the history of our solar system.
meanings.sent2: The planetesimals collided and merged to create larger planets.
meanings.sent3: The planetesimals had a party in space to celebrate their role in forming planets.
meanings.sent4: The planetesimals danced around the sun, like tiny dancers in the cosmic ballet.
meanings.sent5: Looking through a telescope, you can see the planetesimals twinkling in the night sky.

meanings.definition: Objects that are believed to have eventually coalesced to form planets.
meanings.sent1: Astronomers theorize that planetesimals came together to build the planets we know.
meanings.sent2: The planetesimals' journey ended when they transformed into full-fledged planets.
meanings.sent3: The planetesimals threw a farewell party before becoming planets, complete with asteroid cake.
meanings.sent4: The planetesimals united like pieces of a puzzle to give birth to new worlds.
meanings.sent5: In the vastness of space, the planetesimals quietly prepared to become planets.

meanings.definition: Rocky or icy bodies that orbit a star.
meanings.sent1: Telescopes can detect planetesimals moving around distant stars.
meanings.sent2: The planetesimals in our solar system vary in composition and size.
meanings.sent3: The planetesimals had a race around the sun, with the comets cheering them on.
meanings.sent4: The planetesimals shimmered like jewels in the darkness of space.
meanings.sent5: Explorers dream of reaching distant planetesimals to uncover their secrets.
